uk.ac.cam.quebec.wikiwrapper.WikiException

  • Packages that use WikiException 
    Package Description
    uk.ac.cam.quebec.wikiwrapper  

    • Uses of WikiException in uk.ac.cam.quebec.wikiwrapper

      Methods in uk.ac.cam.quebec.wikiwrapper that throw WikiException 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      abstract java.lang.String WikiEdit.getContent()
      On first call it will retrieve the content through an external call (costly), afterwards it will just give the cached value.
      abstract java.lang.String WikiEdit.getDiff()
      On first call it will retrieve the diff through an external call (costly), afterwards it will just give the cached value.
      abstract java.util.List<WikiEdit> WikiArticle.getEdits(int editCount)
      Method to get the edits list.
      abstract int WikiArticle.getViews()
      Method to get usage data for a page.
      static java.util.List<WikiArticle> WikiFetch.search(java.lang.String searchTerm, int max, int edits)
      Search Wikipedia for articles simply by supplying a string.
      Constructors in uk.ac.cam.quebec.wikiwrapper that throw WikiException 
      Constructor and Description
      WikiArticle(java.lang.String title)
      Constructor for an article.
      WikiEdit(java.lang.String id, java.lang.String comment, java.lang.String wikiTime, WikiArticle article)
      Constructs all of the edit bar the diff and article as these are the most costly pieces of data
